Articles.Content:
If the title doesn't explain it here's something that will:

![Lp05cBh.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/Lp05cBh.jpg)

This except slanted to where the top is flat.

Something like this? Or do you want a straight section on the Mk2 side then begin the slant?

![XPkMAojh.png](http://i.imgur.com/XPkMAojh.png)

> 
> Something like this? Or do you want a straight section on the Mk2 side then begin the slant?
> [http://i.imgur.com/XPkMAojh.png](http://i.imgur.com/XPkMAojh.png)

No. I believe he's looking for something like those:

![168px-C7_Brand_Adapter_Slanted_-_2.5m_to_1.25m.png](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/thumb/2/21/C7_Brand_Adapter_Slanted_-_2.5m_to_1.25m.png/168px-C7_Brand_Adapter_Slanted_-_2.5m_to_1.25m.png)![154px-Mk3_to_2.5m_Adapter_Slanted.png](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/thumb/0/03/Mk3_to_2.5m_Adapter_Slanted.png/154px-Mk3_to_2.5m_Adapter_Slanted.png)

Except not 2.5m to 1.25m or Mk3 to 2.5m but rather Mk2 to 1.25m.

> 
> No. I believe he's looking for something like those:
> [http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/thumb/2/21/C7_Brand_Adapter_Slanted_-_2.5m_to_1.25m.png/168px-C7_Brand_Adapter_Slanted_-_2.5m_to_1.25m.png](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/thumb/2/21/C7_Brand_Adapter_Slanted_-_2.5m_to_1.25m.png/168px-C7_Brand_Adapter_Slanted_-_2.5m_to_1.25m.png) [http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/thumb/0/03/Mk3_to_2.5m_Adapter_Slanted.png/154px-Mk3_to_2.5m_Adapter_Slanted.png](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/thumb/0/03/Mk3_to_2.5m_Adapter_Slanted.png/154px-Mk3_to_2.5m_Adapter_Slanted.png)
> 
> Except not 2.5m to 1.25m or Mk3 to 2.5m but rather Mk2 to 1.25m.

Ahh I see.. that can be done ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Edit: So like this,

![JQHpwKel.png](http://i.imgur.com/JQHpwKel.png)
